Token.Abstract: The final URL accessed in the request, including all redirections.
The final URL accessed in the request, including all redirections.
Sets a block to be executed when the connection receives incoming data, as handled by the NSURLConnectionDelegate method connection:didReceiveData:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract:
A block object to be executed when the connection receives incoming data. The block has no return type and takes one argument: the NSData object.
@discussion If this block is implemented, then the user assumes all responsibility for processing the incoming data. In particular, AH_AFURLConnectionOperation will not write to the outputStream ivar, nor store the response ivar.

Token.Abstract: Sets a block to be executed to when a response is received, as handled by the NSURLConnectionDelegate method connection:didReceiveResponse:.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the connection receives a response object. The block has no return type and takes one argument: the NSURLResponse object.
